Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a low stool; ► for resting the feet on when sitting; ≈ often associated with authority

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= referent to an unknown or not yet identified location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= referent to an unknown or not yet identified location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to look at; hence: = action by which humans or deities pay attention to certain matters
literally: afflicted, poor; hence: = a class of people that do not think highly of themselves, ◄ usually as a result of poverty or other kinds of suffering
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= process by which humans shake or tremble violently and involuntarily, ◄ caused by fear or another unnerving experience

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns

= relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a pig (חֲזִיר) associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

= hairy mammal with hoofs, brown or gray in color; non ruminant and omnivorous; ◄ |iSus scropus|i*, wild or domesticated land animal; ► unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ regarded as an ugly, filthy, and destructive animal and often associated with pagan rituals
literally: to cause incense to be remembered; hence: = action by which human offer a sacrifice of incense as a memorial

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= state of being non existent, implying that an existing object has been destroyed, or that an object exists in people's imagination only; ≈ regarded therefore as totally insignificant

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a reference to one of the deities of the nations, expressing strong disgust

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= state in which humans experience a strong fear that certain things might happen to them
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which humans shake or tremble violently and involuntarily, ◄ caused by fear or another unnerving experience

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

Node.gloss: to drive out|to drive away|to banish|to reject
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans force other humans to leave a certain location
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded

Node.gloss: to be honorable|to be worthy of honor|to be renowned
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are regarded as worthy of honor and respect
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans feel and show great joy

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= process by which humans produce loud sounds, either as individuals or groups, in order to give expression to aggression, revelry, or excessive pride

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities deal with other humans of deities according to their actions, which could be either by punishing them or by giving them a reward
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time

= process by which human have painful contractions of the womb, ◄ which is caused by an advanced state of pregnancy ► and results in birth of new offspring; ≈ associated with anguish, trembling, suffering, and fear
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time
= experience of having painful contractions of the womb; ◄ caused by advanced state of pregnancy; ► and resulting in the birth of new offspring; ≈ associated with fear and agony
= person or animal belonging to the male sex

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= process by which humans and animals bring forth new offspring

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= process by which humans and animals bring forth new offspring

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.english: bring to the point of birth

Node.definition: = causative process by which deities cause females among humans or animals to give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative process by which deities cause females among humans or animals to give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor

Node.gloss: to withhold|to prevent|to keep from|to stop from|to close
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities keep people or objects from activities that they are normally involved in

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= to experience grief and show this by one's actions; ◄ caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances
= action by which newborn children drink milk from their mother's breasts

Node.gloss: to have (one's) fill > to be contented
Node.definition: literally: to be satiated; hence: = process by which the desire of humans is fulfilled
= one of the breasts of a woman
= part of the breast of a female mammal from which milk can be secreted
= state in which an event is of an extraordinary nature

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to stretch out (one's hand and hold out before someone); hence: = causative action by which deities cause good things to happen to humans as an act of kindness
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= material possessions such as gold, silver, animals and slaves; ► usually results in a position of honor and power

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= action by which newborn children drink milk from their mother's breasts
= side of a person's body, especially of the rump, right above the hip; ► place where people sometimes carried their small children; ≈ location where one's body is unprotected and vulnerable

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: bones; hence: = the physical body of a human being
= a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: (one's) hand is with (someone else); hence: = action by with humans or deities offer assistance to (other) humans
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to express one's anger|to vent one's anger
Node.definition: = action by which deities or humans give free expression to their anger regarding someone else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= process by which a strong wind blows, ► causing destruction and inspiring fear; ≈ often associated with the appearance and intervention of God and used as a symbol of warfare and hardship
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
literally: to cause (one's) anger to turn (towards someone); hence: = action by which humans express their anger in words or actions
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= action by which humans or deities speak to animals, humans, deities, or natural objects in anger, in order to express their displeasure and cause them to change their behavior
= hot glowing body of fire

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= living creature, including both humans and animals; ◄ conceived as an object that mainly consists of flesh; ≈ regarded as weak and passing
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity
= process by which humans take the necessary steps to render themselves ceremonially pure
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

= hairy mammal with hoofs, brown or gray in color; non ruminant and omnivorous; ◄ |iSus scropus|i*, wild or domesticated land animal; ► unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ regarded as an ugly, filthy, and destructive animal and often associated with pagan rituals
= object that is regarded as utterly detestable, as associating with it would make one unclean

= generic term covering all small rodents, such as mice, rats, etc.; ► unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten; can become a pest when found in great number; ≈ possibly associated with bubonic plague
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= procedure for achieving a certain purpose, originating from someone's לֵב mind
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
literally: tongue; hence: = a system of communication used by a community, ethnic group, or nation

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= ethnic group, possibly to be identified with Put (פּוּט)
= land and ethnic group, possibly to be identified with the Lydians ◄ located in Asia Minor; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם) ► known as archers
= causative action by which humans or animals move an object from one location to another, usually with some effort or difficulty
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= nation, ◄ possibly to be identified with Tabal, located in vicinity of the Black Sea; considered descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Tubal (תֻּבַל)
= nation, usually identified with Greece; considered the descendants of Japheth (יֶפֶת) through his son Javan
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= vehicle; ► used for transporting goods and people

= male or female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; ► used for riding and as pack animals; ≈ associated with a lack of understanding

= a large, four legged animal with one or two humps on its back, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; suited to life in desert areas as they store excess food in their humps, are able to go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which people, animals, or objects are considered free from contamination, ► as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the objects can be put to normal use

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
= state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
expression indicating that a certain event is repeated every month
= religious celebration at the appearance of the new moon, i.e. at the beginning of the month
= religious celebration at the appearance of the new moon, i.e. at the beginning of the month
expression indicating that a certain event is repeated every sabbath
= living creature, including both humans and animals; ◄ conceived as an object that mainly consists of flesh; ≈ regarded as weak and passing
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= body of an animal or human that has died or been killed; ► source of pollution and impurity
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
= a general term for worms of all kinds; ≈ associated with uncleanness, decay, and insignificance
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= process by which a fire comes to an end, either in a natural way or by force
= an object or person that is considered extremely repugnant or loathsome to others
= living creature, including both humans and animals; ◄ conceived as an object that mainly consists of flesh; ≈ regarded as weak and passing
